app.description: Show a list of tickets with the same Custom Field value as current ticket
app.name: Related Tickets by Custom Field
app.installation_instructions: Get custom_field id you want to use as reference from Settings -> Ticket Fields and introduce it at app configuration form. You can also use the word 'requester' as 'id' if you want to get tickets submitted by the same person.
app.long_description: A Zendesk app that shows a list of tickets that have the same Custom Field(s) value(s) as the current ticket being viewed. Custom Field(s) to be used are configuration parameters of the app.

custom_field_id.label: ID of the custom field to be used to get related tickets. Get Custom Field Id for the custom field you want the app to use. You can get the ID from your Zendesk Support -> Admin Home -> Ticket Fileds -> Field -> Edit. You can also use the word 'requester' or 'organization' as 'id' if you want to get tickets requested by the same person or organization.

custom_field_id_2.label: OPTIONAL: ID of the second field to be used to get related tickets. If more than one field are defined, related tickets will be found by looking for tickets with same field1_value AND field2_value as current ticket.

custom_field_id_3.label: OPTIONAL: ID of the third field to be used to get related tickets. If more than two fields are defined, related tickets will be found by looking for tickets with same field1_value AND field2_value AND field3_value as current ticket.

show_ticket_status.label: Enable show each related ticket's status

show_ticket_updatedat.label: Enable show each related ticket last update date and time

show_ticket_priority.label: Enable show each related ticket's priority

show_ticket_group_name.label: Enable show each related ticket's group name

show_only_open_tickets.label: If enabled, it won't show tickets with status 'closed'.
